body:
Features and Enhancements

Bulk Paste Zip Codes
  • The ability to paste a list of zip codes has been added to the following components in Network360:
    • Competitive Dashboard
    • Compare Networks
    • Create a List
    • Recruitment
    • Look up a Prodiver
  • Users can toggle between standard geography search and bulk zip code search. Radius search is still available in Create a List by clicking the radius search icon.
  • Click the bulk zip code search icon , paste a delimited list of zip codes into the field, and execute the search as usual.
  • Guidelines:
    • Zip codes must be separated by one of the following delimiters: comma, semicolon, pipe, space, or new line.
    • The zip code field will accept 5-digit zip codes, whether in the project or not.
    • Anything other than a 5-digit zip code (zip+4, city names, etc.) can be pasted. However, when the user executes the analysis, the user will be notified of any invalid location. All invalid locations must be removed before the analysis can be performed.
